confidentiality_duration.preferred: Perpetual for trade secrets, 5 years for other info
confidentiality_duration.unacceptable: Less than 2 years or terminates immediately

definition_of_confidential_information.preferred: Broad definition including oral and written info
definition_of_confidential_information.acceptable: Written info marked confidential or oral info summarized

permitted_disclosure.preferred: To employees, contractors, and advisors on need-to-know basis
permitted_disclosure.unacceptable: No disclosure permitted even to advisors

return_of_materials.preferred: Return or destroy at Discloser's option within 10 days
